Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity and Action Mechanisms of Arg-Rich Short Analog Peptides Designed from the C-Terminal Loop Region of American Oyster Defensin (AOD)
Literature.Author: Seo JK, Kim DG, Lee JE, Park KS, Lee IA, Lee KY, Kim YO, Nam BH

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human dermal fibroblasts:12-13% Cytotoxicity=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MEC=0.4µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes KCTC 3314(MEC=53.7µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MEC=4.2µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans KCCM 40105(MEC=1.5µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila KCTC 2358(MEC=3.3µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MEC=5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MEC=6.8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 2004(MEC=3µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium KCTC 2514(MEC=6.5µg/ml),Shigella sonnei KCTC 2009(MEC=5.5µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MEC=54µg/ml)
